\subsection{Erysipelatoclostridiaceae}

\begin{small}
Members of the Erysipelatoclostridiaceae family of bacteria are known for their
ability to produce beneficial compounds such as butyrate, which has been shown
to promote gut health and have anti-inflammatory properties. Some species of
Erysipelatoclostridiaceae are also involved in the degradation of complex
carbohydrates, producing SCFAs that provide energy for the body.
\end{small}
